title: Jasper Philipsen Wins Milan-San Remo in Select Group Sprint, Pogačar Surge Can’t Break Rivals
content:
Huge Poggio attack by Tadej Pogačar (UAE Team Emirates) too little too late, with small group fighting it out for victory.

Read the full article at Jasper Philipsen Wins Milan-San Remo in Select Group Sprint, Pogačar Surge Can’t Break Rivals on Velo.
author: sstokes
